info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 10:14PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Weld and northeastern Boulder Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 1014 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Frederick, or 25 miles southwest of Greeley, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Longmont, Firestone, Frederick, Berthoud, Dacono and Mead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
